titleStmt.title: New papers from the armie, concerning the Kings Majesties letter sent to His Highnesse the Duke of York, written by His Majesties own hand. Also, the resolution and proceedings of their commissioners at the treaty at Wickham; concerning the peace and safety of the kingdome of England. With a remarkable passage concerning the kingdome of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Burfoit, T.

titleStmt.title: New papers from the armie, concerning the Kings Majesties letter sent to His Highnesse the Duke of York, written by His Majesties own hand. Also, the resolution and proceedings of their commissioners at the treaty at Wickham; concerning the peace and safety of the kingdome of England. With a remarkable passage concerning the kingdome of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Burfoit, T.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: Wickham Iuly 9. 1647. T. Burfoit.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "July 13"; 'June' in imprint altered to "July".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
